channel.title: Adding explock and expunlock

item.title: Adding explock and expunlock
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

hey guys so far… ive been wanting to make explock and expunlock… ive add this so far under implements runnable.

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public boolean explock = false;

and the commands ive added was… these…

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("explock") && playerRights >= 0){ explock = true; } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("expunlock") && playerRights >= 0){ explock = false; }

well guys hope i can get a little help lawl thanks so much.
